Using Git Repos with CFEngine

March 27, 2015

Reading time ~1 minute

This guide will detail how to write a CFEngine promise that will retrieve a git repo from a remote repository. In my previous guide, I showed how to create said git repository and enable remote connections to it with SSH keys.
